dmca.title: Telephony Company Asks Google to Remove Links to Alleged Infringer
dmca.body:
Dear Partner in Internet Services:

Thank you for your kind and measured response to our current frustration with a web site pirate that is copying our website and hiding their identity. While our biggest concern is that they are deliberately trying to hurt our web lead generation by de-ranking our website with Google, your and our biggest line of defense is likely to be their violation of the copyright on our web site.

Under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998, service providers, such as Google and ISPs, have Safe Harbor provisions that protect them if they follow the requirements outlined in the act. These provisions allow and require service providers to "expeditiously remove or disable access" to infringing material when they become aware of the violation without becoming liable to either the copyright holder or the infringer. The alleged infringer then has the right to contest the removal.

Thus we do not see Google as part of the problem and we do not desire to take any action against Google. Rather we see Google as part of the solution and are looking to continue the great relationship we have had with Google over the past three years. To do that we are requesting that Google:

1. Not penalize the ranking of DialResults or its parent DataResults due to what looks like search engine spamming by www.etopiagolf.com and/or www.vantagevoicesystms.com.

2. After reviewing the information below, remove links to www.etopiagolf.com and www.vantagevoicesystems.com that lead customers to their infringing web sites.

The remainder of this letter outlines the details of the infringement as your legal department requested.

1. Copyrighted Work Infringed
The www.DialResults.com web site and most of its navigation pages, including: www.DialResults.com/solutions.html
www.DialResults.com/products.html
www.DialResults.com/difference.html
www.DialResults.com/features.html
www.DialResults.com/employment.html
www.DialResults.com/emerging.html
www.DialResults.com/partners.htm. (part)

The content is the same except that our logo has been pasted over with a pictures and our trade name DialResults has been replaced with either etopiagolf or vantagevoicesystems.

All of the navigation page URL names are the same if you replace DialResults with either etopiagolf or vantagevoicesystems.

2. Material that is Infringing

www.etopiagolf.com and www.vantagevoicesystems.com. both have copied our web pages and replaced our logo with a picture and our trade name DialResults has been replaced with either etopiagolf or vantagevoicesystems. They have kept the same URL names with their company name replacing ours for the pages in item 1 above (that is www.Dialresults.com/solutions.html becomes www.etopiagolf.com/solutions.html).

In terms of Google search names at least the following are of concern:

Search Query				Search Results
www.etopiagolf.com			www.etopiagolf.com 
etopiagolf.com				www.etopiagolf.com
www.vantagevoicesystems.com		www.vantagevoicesystems.com
vantagevoicesystems.com			www.vantaaevoicesystems.com
predictive dialers			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
predictive dialers			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
predictive dialing			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
predictive dialing systems		www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
predictive dialers voip			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
contact center software			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
contact center management		www.etopiagolf.com 
						www.vantagevoicesysterms.com
call center software			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
call center systems			www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
call center management software	www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com
CTI software				www.etopiagolf.com
						www.vantagevoicesystems.com

It is easy to see that our site is the original because:
